:: Najah::

Najah saw his comander and he was watting Zardus's order..

"I =
hope that our Reptilian-boss doesn't wait so much... I'm impatient to attac=
k!"
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, October 17, 2000 12:28 AM
  Subject: Re: Naja=
h wants to kill someone


  ::Zardus/DevilDuer/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/WarMa=
chine::

  DevilDuer waves at Najah, motioning for him to be quiet.

  "Tha=
t's Zardus," he says, pointing up to Zardus, still waiting for the 
  Allia=
nce commander's answer to the Mafia's proposal, "Don't fire yet, wait 
  fo=
r the signal from Zardus for what to do. If we do open fire, though, just 
=
  shoot at that base," he points to the Mafia base, "And at anyone who shoo=
ts 
  at ya."
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Zardus growls as he hears Deemos'=
 words, watching Mobster fire at Scorpina. 
  He looks back at the base, ac=
tivating his comm-link.

  "Treaties made while a faction is being defeated=
 often don't last long at 
  all," he replies, "And besides, your troops ha=
vn't ceased fire."

  He switches his comm frequency to Alliance, "Kill the=
m," he says simply, 
  firing his plasma launcher at Mobster.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Recieving Zardus' command, Bloodystrike flies to near his le=
ader, firing a 
  couple of rockets at Mobster.

  Near him, Reptilica flie=
s up, also firing a rocket and Mobster.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  WarMach=
ine roars as he hears Zardus' command, firing off three missiles at 
  Mobs=
ter as he runs at the bot, attepting to kick him.

  He could feel his powe=
r begin to lessen. Soon, he'll have to revert back to 5 
  bots..
  ~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  "Hear that? Fire on that big dude!" DevilDuer says to Na=
jah, pulling out a 
  small rifle instead.

  He fires a few shots at Mobst=
er, although shots of that small size probably 
  wouldn't do squat to a ge=
stalt.

        eGroups Sponsor
